channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Nettles overgrown as are other weeds and brambles completely overgrown, 5th August
item.description:
This is an ongoing maintenance problem . The nettles and weeds are overgrown and overhanging the path . The brambles have grown and hang from the hedging and are also growing on the pathway . It would be ideal if this was seen to before the children return to school .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erickson Gardens, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More waste dumped on corner, 5th August
item.description:
Again, more waste has been dumped at this spot. This is the 2nd time today, 3rd time in a week. GIVE US COUNCIL BINS PLEASE! You are wasting our council tax collecting this recurring waste. Just give us bins please. Long term solutions needed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crossway, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of rubbish blocking footpath., 5th August
item.description:
There is so much rubbish here it is difficult to cycle past. It looks like there are rough sleepers here. This should be a nice wildlife area instead it is a dumping ground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): White Hart Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Tree Cut Back, 5th August
item.description:

item.title: No street or road clean, 5th August
item.description:
Barnard Close and Poyntell Crescent have not had a road or street clean for months. There are leaves & dirt along the road and around the big tree in Barnard Close, grass cutter comes and cuttings all left which subsequently go all over road & make weeds worse. Your contractor came the other day & literally picked up 4 weeds outside one house, the whole area needs a proper de weed & clean.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnard Close, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and Headboard Dumped, 5th August
item.description:
Mattress and headboard dumped in alleyway between Church St and Oldfield Rd / Painsthorpe Rd. Previously reported on 4 Aug. Got a message today 5 Aug to say the issue has been actioned / resolved. This is not correct. The items are still in the alleyway.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Defoe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
